name: Thornbark Walker
flavor: The thorns on its body are razor sharp, and capable of piercing through a knight's armor.
ability: [Fort Burst] Summon this creature. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Elven Farstriker
flavor: Despite how her blade looks, it has a surprisingly long reach.
ability: [CONT] For each of your non-green creatures, this creature gets +1/+1.

name: Primeape Javelineer
flavor: Once he has marked a target, it is not long before they find a spear sticking out of their chest.

name: Fleetwing Sprite
flavor: The fairies of the forest are playful creatures who abhor bloodshed.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may put a card from your hand into your resource zone.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into your resource zone. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Nature's Touch
flavor: All life comes from the earth.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay [2] to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When a creature at this fort is destroyed during your opponent's turn, if this card is an ambush, you may summon that creature. (Put this card into your discard pile afterwards.)

name: Laelania's Call
flavor: The elements hear her call, and they respond with haste.
ability:
Summon a cost 4 or less green creature or a cost 3 or less creature from your hand.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into your discard pile, and summon a cost 7 or less creature from your hand. (When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Runemark of Tir na Nog
flavor: The runemark of Tir na Nog is a symbol of peace and goodwill throughout the land.

name: Dramph Tommar, Kingpin
flavor: Think big.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose two dice, and exchange their values.
[AUTO] When this creature is [Dragocross](Blue), increase the values of all of your dice by 1. (Dice values cannot go above 6.)

name: Gillman Raider
flavor: "Prepare for trouble!"

name: Rejuvenate
flavor: A song of healing passed down through the ages.
ability:
For each of your forts with one or less barriers, draw a card.
[Dice 1-3](Green)Then, put the top card of your deck into your resource zone.
[Fort Burst] Play this card without paying the cost. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: All Guns Blazing
flavor: He can suppress an entire army with his advanced weaponry.
ability:
Choose an opposing fort and [REST] all creatures at that fort.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into your discard pile, choose a creature, [REST] it, and draw a card. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Izarco-Tvash, Born of Magma
flavor: A dreaded creature feared even by its allies, as it may spontaneously erupt.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, choose one of your dice, and change its value to 6. Then, choose any number of opposing creatures, and deal 6 damage divided as you choose among those creatures.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Red)When this creature is destroyed, choose any number of opposing creatures, and deal 7 damage divided as you choose among those creatures.

name: Stormfeather Screecher
flavor: The Stormfeather harpies are a violent bunch, even for harpies.
ability:
[CONT] When this creature deals damage to a fort, it deals 2 damage instead.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Green)This creature gets +1/+1.

name: Carefree Orc
flavor: All young orcs are full of energy and eager to help.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature attacks, you may choose a creature, and deal 1 damage to it.

name: Wandering Orc
flavor: He may have a paunch, but his swing is nothing to laugh about.

name: Boneclub Giant

name: Hidden Blade
flavor: The unseen threat is the deadliest.

name: Highlands Rogue
flavor: The power of the dragon heightens a warrior's senses far beyond their normal limitations.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature attacks a fort, if another of your creatures attacked that fort during that turn, this creature gets +2/+2 for this turn

name: Torch
flavor: Dragons are quick to anger, and even quicker to ignite those who provoke their wrath.
ability:
Choose a creature, and deal X damage to it, where X is the value of one of your red dice.

name: Standard of Tauris
flavor: Only the strongest warriors are given the honor of being flagbearers of Tauris.
